website_summaries.verdict: This folding mirror is a solid option for families needing a larger, protected product.
pros: Only half an inch thick when folded
Includes a stitched cover for mirror protection
Cover doubles as an adjustable stand with three different angle options
Can be used both in the home and while traveling
cons: Many customers report issues with the mirror arriving cracked from shipping

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot for work and vacations, often staying in AirBnBs that don't always have good lighting or mirrors in the right places for doing your makeup. This little mirror is perfect for that. Set it up anywhere and it props up nicely by itself. It folds down nice and slim, while also protecting the mirror with the top. It looks great too. I just received it, so cant' speak for its longevity yet, but it seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: TCon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this travel mirror. It’s perfect for traveling. The compact size means it fits in my suitcase without taking up any extra space, it’s light weight and just generally a good buy. Shipping was also fast, another plus
customer_reviews.author: Stacey chavira

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put in our R.V so that I wouldn't be stuck in the small bathroom to put my makeup on. It works awesome for that. No more sweating in that little room. I can sit right at the kitchen table and have plenty of room to have my makeup out instead of digging in my travel bag to find it. I don't have anything bad to say about this folding mirror. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mirror (great price) to replace my plastic double sided mirror I use to put on make-up, lotion, etc. This is so fun, looks good and expensive, large frame, yet closes to a nice flat easy to transport or store mirror.
customer_reviews.author: KobeLove

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than I expected for the price. The cover is nice and the mirror is large. It will fit great in my luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this. I needed something user friendly for my desk and this is perfect. I broke my last mirror stand by knocking it off the desk. This is durable and I'm pretty sure that won't happen again.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Wooten

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirro, looks good on desk!
customer_reviews.text: I made all my sales staff buy one of these for when they are on the phone. I am sure it would make a good travel mirror, especially for ladies, but for a sales person, this mirror looks nice on the desk and allows them to be sure they are smiling when they are talking on the phone. Regardless of how crappy your day has been, if you smile when on the phone, you sound happy.
customer_reviews.author: The Wudman

customer_reviews.title: I Get So Many Inquiries
customer_reviews.text: This mirror was a replacement for another that was broken. I'm glad the other was broken. This mirror is perfect for my work location. I fold it and place it in my drawer at the end of the night. I love that it's adjustable. Lots of my coworkers use it and we're all different heights. They love it and I get so many inquiries as to where I bought it. I added my own touches by bedazzling it. I would buy this mirror again for myself or for others as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Young

customer_reviews.title: Nice little mirror.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed a mirror for drawing projects and this has the perfect size and angle for what she needed.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Pomerantz

customer_reviews.title: It is a Good Gift
customer_reviews.text: My mother loves this it a good gift she use this to help her do her hair when just want to sit and make up. No longer does she confuse me and use her laptop potato camera for her hair or take up the bathroom. With this she sit comfortable anywhere and do what she must and want to do. Just wish it came with a cleaning cloth bonus that in various color. Will update review with bad potato quality picture as soon as she puts it down in a place I could find it.
customer_reviews.author: My Isha

customer_reviews.title: Traveling mirror I give it all five stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best idea in years for having a padded, flat, and protected 4 1/4 x 6 1/4 mirrored surface to tuck safely in you bag. It will easily go in my computer bag, my traveling tote, my duffle bag or overnight bag. Placed on a table top, the mirror is directed directly at your face. No moving around trying to get your mirror in the correct place. I highly recommend this product. I would also suggest this for a vanity, girls room on her desk, etc.
customer_reviews.author: P Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great For Contouring!!!
customer_reviews.text: It stays up in different angles so I can see my face in different lighting it looks so pretty and it so simple to use leather case look so fancy I love this mirror my favorite!!!!
customer_reviews.author: BarbieDoLL

customer_reviews.title: A Very Useful and Well Made Folding Mirror
customer_reviews.text: This mirror stand is beautifully made with smooth covering material and fine stitching in white. The mirror sets snugly into the base when open. The mirror is large enough to serve as a travel make-up mirror when placed on a bedside table or desk. It folds into itself as a neat book-like package.I love mine and I think it would make a great gift for any traveler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a using on a plane
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a using on a plane. I used it to insert my contacts before landing. iIt is the perfect size for the seat table. It stored flat in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Eve L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for owners of needy senior dogs :)
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today, and it's perfect for my needs. I have a very old dog who's extremely needy and sick at the moment, thus I like to be able to see her when I'm working, and she's much more calm when she can see my face. So it's a win-win for both of us. It's the perfect size - not too big, not too small, and I appreciate the fact that it can be moved to any angle very easily on top of my desk. I also like that it folds up to be flat so that it's portable. There's a reason this is the bestseller!
customer_reviews.author: ShannonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It broke upon delivery and no return policy
customer_reviews.text: Mirror arrived in pieces and why is it non exchangeable?
customer_reviews.author: 1lazycat

customer_reviews.title: This thing is nice
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I'm doing a review on a travel mirror; but here we are. I purchased this to keep in my teardrop camper trailer. I wanted a mirror that was protected from breaking or smudging, so this one right off the bat appealed to me. After getting this I was surprised at how nice it looks. The leather, the stitching, and the clarity of glass had me wondering if Amazon accidentally put the wrong price on the listing; because this is far too nice a product for that price. This looks designer. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: bcb

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the mirror for my boss's office so she can see if she has food stuck in her teeth before she goes to a meeting. She likes it and has it on her office shelf. It will work as a mirror that doesn't take many hard knocks - as I was figuring out how to unfold the frame, an area that shouldn't have come unglued, did. The mirror itself had a nice light film to pull away and it isn't warped, scratched, or discolored - so, cool!
customer_reviews.author: S. Pennell

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken!
customer_reviews.text: It’s arrived broken!! And now if I click the button for replacement it says returns are not available ... lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Mirror
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this mirror. The first one held up extremely well, looks classy, feels solid, and travels exceptionally well. It is sturdy, and I have no qualms about it breaking in a suitcase. It's been all over the world and always comes out of the bag intact. Based on my experience with it, I decided to buy another one for a weekend home. This is a good quality mirror, packaged well, and is a great price for what it is. Don't be afraid to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Mael

customer_reviews.title: a very nice mirror....
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because so many times I travel and get caught without a mirror a can almost press my nose against (I'm near sighted, so when I take my glasses off, I need a mirror super close to me). This fits the bill beautifully. It looks really nice, it folds up and travels beautifully, and there is no distortion in the mirror. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kooky Munga

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for babies!
customer_reviews.text: The leather protects the mirror well, and the stand allows it to lay on its side in a crib or play area. It is lightweight so it is unlikely to injure a baby if they grab it or knock it over. This makes it a perfect mirror to use with a baby, as babies are fascinated with their reflections! Compared to special, colorful baby mirrors, it remains useful even after the baby has grown past infancy.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf Paws

customer_reviews.title: Love it because you don't sit in the mirror all the time
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is very nice I'm is the kind of mirror that doesn't look like an original man it's kind of like they that you have decided to sit back and look into it it gives you the true look of your face and it helps you out and putting on makeup where you don't put on too strong or too late it's just rain that's why I was always told
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Monique Willis

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror
customer_reviews.text: Actual mirror was smaller than i expected. Should have advertised the dimensions of the mirror. That is what i had looked for and could not find. Then it would not have been such a shock when i opened it. Otherwise it does it purpose. Not bulky at all. Love the fold up idean.
customer_reviews.author: MCLG13

customer_reviews.title: NO Returns!
customer_reviews.text: I accidently order this after already ordering one. While I love the product, I don't need two of them. They have a NO RETURN policy!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mirror for traveling and small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: Great size for traveling. Easily slips in a pocket of my Vera Bradley Weekender travel bag with no bulk. Small, 12 oz. Diet Coke bottle in picture for size reference. Clear, sharp image and large enough surface to use for hair/makeup in a small hotel room. Item shipped quickly and arrived in perfect condition .
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Mirror, mirror on my desk....
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror, and so does my daughter who seems to keep it with her. Turns any table, desk, chest of drawers. (you get the idea) into an instant vanity. I love that the mirror is not distorted in any way and shows a true image without any magnification. Perfectly fits in my tote bag and also in daughters gym bag and back pack.
customer_reviews.author: L.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for traveling. I bought it to carry with me to do my makeup while on the plane and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken mirror
customer_reviews.text: Mirror came broken and unable to return. Do not buy! Bad purchase!
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Best mirror for home parties and vendor events
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror for my jewelry parties and vendor events. It folds flat and looks sharp on the table.
customer_reviews.author: amyvan

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Low Profile
customer_reviews.text: The mirror arrived promptly and in good condition. I did not realize that there is a cover that folds over the mirror, both protecting the mirror from scratches and hiding this "vanity" product from others. Additionally, the cover actually flips over and serves as a stand for the mirror so that you can use it with no hands. It's perfect for sliding into a desk drawer at work so that you can do a quick touch up or confirm nothing is in your teeth before your next appointment walks in. The product I received is better than the one I thought I was buying!!
customer_reviews.author: Oskar

customer_reviews.title: Mirrors are exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the larger and smaller travel size to take on a trip in August. The mirrors are well padded with the case. But, I am going to carry it on so I know it doesn't break. The mirrors arrived a couple of days earlier than scheduled. I love that. Both mirrors are light weight.
customer_reviews.author: FDG

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect! I really like that you can close it to cover the mirror so it won’t get dirty. It’s just like it said it would be. No problems. It’s nice to have a little room around the mirror to not get finger prints too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I use this mirror when I'm traveling. I keep it in my luggage so I always have something. It is nice when you're sharing the bathroom with a few people. I wish it had a light and different nooks so you can adjust the angle depending on desk and chair height.
customer_reviews.author: OGmandyV

customer_reviews.title: what you see is what you get
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered as promised. It is nice in today's market exchanges when both parties keep their word. I will not hesitate to use this company again. As a matter of fact, I have put this company on my favorite list. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: ike64

customer_reviews.title: You need this.
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight and sleek design. No scratches when it came in the mail it was perfect!! Very happy with this purchase. Hella reliable. ! I didn’t have a mirror above my makeup area and this is so portable and can be set up everywhere with any angle. I am in love.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this for doing my makeup. I’m lazy and do my makeup on my bed, and this sits perfectly balanced on top of a pillow. Super great quality as well! Very satisfied :)
customer_reviews.author: DestinyD99

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for Price. Easily travels.
customer_reviews.text: I used the mirror for daily hair styling and cosmetic application at my vanity. I wanted something that would fold flat and fit into the drawers of my dress vanity. I wish there was options for slightly larger but this size is perfect for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Bode

customer_reviews.title: Broken Perfection Bummer
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Dang thing was broken before I got it out of the box. Bummer. It was the right size and with options for standing it up that I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is very clear and way it sets up is perfect. I like that the case folds up to protect the mirror and the materials look like they will hold up a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: As described👌
customer_reviews.text: I now know I like the 3fold mirrors that I can adjust up and down but this here little mirror IS awesome on the go for a quick glance
customer_reviews.author: Miss Fee

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, wish it was bigger
customer_reviews.text: We keep this in our travel trailer for an extra mirror. It’s very nice, and folds up for easy storage, but we wish it was a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: lindsaylur

customer_reviews.title: Compact but nice
customer_reviews.text: This works great on my jewelry display table. I use it daily putting on my jewelry as well. Folds flat and cover protects it.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mirror to use on the airplane while I’m traveling and it is perfect!!!! Love how flat it folds down to, makes it easy for storage. Almost like the size of an iPad!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Received shattered
customer_reviews.text: This was received shattered and when I tried to return it all I got was it wasn’t eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: Serena C.

customer_reviews.title: Good size mirror for my son
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use a mirror easy to carry around and with no pointy edges to use with my son, so he can see himself practice mouth position and tongue movement while I am trying to teach him correct pronunciation and letter sounds, and this one besides been affordable met my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Anny

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these, one for myself and one for my mom. I was shocked at the quality when they arrived because they were so inexpensive. The outside of the mirror is super high quality, the compact size makes me think these will travel well, and the mirror itself is wonderful quality (no distortion). If you're considering this mirror go ahead and buy it!
customer_reviews.author: VWalker

customer_reviews.title: Not my cup of tea
customer_reviews.text: When I set it up it looks so far away from I don’t know I just don’t like it. Wish it was a magnifying mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn G.

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect size mirror and it folds flat for easy storage. Nice little leather like case that doubles as a stand. I bought 2 and so far my daughter and I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: shannon s

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so I can put my eye contacts in. Works great. I set it up and when I’m finished I put it away. Easy!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice travel mirror...
customer_reviews.text: While camping, one does not need to leave the chair as the mirror stores easily.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent travel mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel, it's like carrying a book! I also like to keep this on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Oneisha

customer_reviews.title: Nice, so far
customer_reviews.text: I just received this mirror today. It seems like it will be nice for traveling, which is the primary reason why I bought it. We will see how it holds up, but it seems put together well. I’ll update if any major problems come up, but it’s a little too early to tell.
customer_reviews.author: Karol22

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment
customer_reviews.text: I am deployed overseas and needed a mirror. I am able to prop it up on a shelf, I’m tall so i sandwiched it between a bunk bed mattress and a bed frame and it sits up perfectly. It’s extremely simple but I had to use my cell phone camera to do my hair before the mirror arrived. I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, it is a bit small travel sized but I can see fine the mirror is clear and it’s lightweight shipped fast and seller was willing to replace if it came broken, but it did not so that’s good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my husband, he loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, he is a truck driver and he said it is perfect and the leather cover protects it if it should fall
customer_reviews.author: Tammy W.

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect. It is large enough to see my whole ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a tabletop mirror for makeup application. This is perfect. It is large enough to see my whole face -- and also folds up flat for safe storage in a cabinet. It is very well made and the mirror itself is very good quality. I also really like that the mirror is protected when folded up. Thanks for a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Allred

customer_reviews.title: NICE LITTLE MIRROR
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for in the car when you like to drive with the windows open and you hair needs a touch up before your appointment!!! Thanks DUcare
customer_reviews.author: DOUG CHALMERS

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Really like the mirror so far! It’s big enough to see my entire face but not too awkward for my small hands if I want to hold it up versus setting it on the counter. The stand works really well too. I haven’t travelled with the mirror yet so I can’t comment on it’s durability through travel. Great mirror for the price and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great item. I travel with it and use it at work. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy the 1st time...
customer_reviews.text: This was the best little mirror EVER! It fit in everything and just is so perfect. So perfect my sister snagged mine so I ordered another. The second one I just recieved in the mail was broken! Super bummed disappointed that it was in a fairly large box and had plenty of room to slam around.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecka_Harhart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mirror for my desk at work. I love that I can fold it up and throw it in a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution to for our bathroom while we are waiting for mirror installation by our landlord. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A Bolus

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I just received this mirror in the mail today and it is perfect for me. It's compact and easy to fold. The way it folds is very good for keeping the mirror protected inside any luggage. It is not heavy at all and is easy to use. Definitely would recommend to anyone needing a travel mirror or just a small/portable vanity mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: In all fairness, it's not supposed to, but I wish I could lay it sideways and fold it up that way. Other than that it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and so convenient. Nicely packaged. Good price. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Ferland

customer_reviews.title: I Like It !
customer_reviews.text: I started a come to your house hair service. At first I thought the mirror was too small, but its actually just rite to sit on the counter/table top so the client can see themselves. It props up at a good angle, and I love how it folds into the stand as a case so it won't scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a guy
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for my son to take to college and to use to put in his contacts.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Ellmer

customer_reviews.title: Not made the best
customer_reviews.text: This product would keep falling down with the slightest movement. I had trouble putting my arm through the slot without it falling down
customer_reviews.author: Ceddric101

customer_reviews.title: Great desk mirror
customer_reviews.text: This is great to keep in your desk drawer. I think it is too big for travel though. Nice cover on it to keep clean
customer_reviews.author: Catie M

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: The mirrow folds to stand up. I like that with the covering it can stand up to being dropped which is what I have been doing lately.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Linn

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for travel. Versatile, sleek looking, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and intact . No chips , breaks or scratches. I recommend

customer_reviews.title: and they're nice. Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, and they're nice. Well worth the price. I'm happy with the purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and portable
customer_reviews.text: I am using this mirror at my table at a craft fair.
customer_reviews.author: MomMom46

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this mirror. Prefect for on the go touch ups. I use it on my desk at work and everyone asks me where they can get one. So lightweight and its folds! Love love it
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Levine

customer_reviews.title: Size of a 7" tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and flat. Almost same size as my 7" tablet. Perfect for daytime touch-ups at my desk and applying that ever important afternoon sunblock mist!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good to take on trips
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mirror and I really liked. Good to take on trips and they shipped really fast!
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Thought the mirror wasn’t big enough for makeup but it is! Perfect for college dorm
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the office
customer_reviews.text: The mirror folds flat and tucks out of the way easily, but pulls out quickly for a touch up at the office. I'm very pleased with it. It also looks good and appears well made. Shipping was efficient with this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for work creepers!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my desk at work! I use it to see behind me so I don’t have a heart attack when people sneak up on me! I have it on it’s side and it still stands up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: B123

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect mirror for travel or for standing up on a dresser. Our daughter has been asking for a mirror that she could stand up on her shelf. This was perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Portable
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I leave it folded flat on the desk till I need it.

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be good quality and I like the protective edge around the ...
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be good quality and I like the protective edge around the mirror itself - unlike another similar product.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mirror for travelling. I will use it a bunch!
customer_reviews.author: CharleyBeez

customer_reviews.title: Compact and office discrete
customer_reviews.text: I got it to put my makeup at the office. Love it. It doesn’t look like I have a beauty item at all and it’s compact.
customer_reviews.author: Kata

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These Mirrors are truly awesome. Love the durability. Leather is much nicer than I thought it would be and the clarity of the mirror very nice as well. I thought that I had perhaps overpaid but once I received them have decided that they are a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Mirror
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas present and my daughter broke the mirror portion just hours after she go it, not the mirrors fault though and it looked neat while it lasted....

customer_reviews.title: great mirror
customer_reviews.text: this is a wonderfu mirror so easy and convenient to set up, very attractive, portable can think of no negatives.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mirror for my desk but it’s so nice and well made I’m going to have to bring it with me everywhere! The packaging was really nice! The product is perfect and really good quality. Just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bird

customer_reviews.title: Great for my desk
customer_reviews.text: I like that this looks good (not cheap looking) and stays standing instead of flopping over like some other mirrors I've had.
customer_reviews.author: FarOut

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mirror for Me
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror. I keep it in my desk drawer at work. It is light weight and folds up flat which makes it easy to store. It opens up to a nice size mirror that easily shows you entire face. I use it to put on my makeup at work when I don’t have time at home.
customer_reviews.author: Shanique

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror. It's not too small or too big. It's cute and very useful for traveling.

customer_reviews.title: Like it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for when I go camping and so far so good.

customer_reviews.title: But works great. Easy to fold and if I put this ...
customer_reviews.text: It feels as little smaller size than expected. But works great. Easy to fold and if I put this during tummy time of my baby, he enjoys it.

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Good size to see entire face,mirror is clear,folds up in sturdy stand .Delivery perfect as always !

customer_reviews.title: It looks very cleap
customer_reviews.text: Unable to fix,looks very cheap.the bracket has no effect at all.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Li

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mirror, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and easy to use. The easel support is very nice to have.

customer_reviews.text: Looks like it might be a small computer tablet when it is folded up, which is nice for my purposes. It is lightweight, and the angle is easily adjustable.
